K10kathinau:9: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapo jānann eva parārthaṃ bhagavantam evam āha /
K10kathinau:12: kārttikakṛṣṇapratipadam ārabhya triṃśad divaseṣu yad ahorātraṃ tatra saṃghasya kaṭhinam utpadyate / 6.a
K10kathinau:14: kṛtakalpadaśārañjanā nīlasūtrasūcīśāstrakalpena tad dānapatayaḥ saṃnipatite saṃghe niḥsārāpayitavyāḥ /
K10kathinau:15: karmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā tato dānapatayo dānaparikarmakathayā pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ / 6.b
K10kathinau:17: kaṭhinapradānaṃ kartukāmena dānapatinā 'ṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe vā māse savinayam upagamya kalpikakārakasya mukhenāryasaṃghasya vijñaptiḥ karaṇīyā tena caivaṃ karaṇīyā /
K10kathinau:19: yadite 'ṅgīkaroty āryasaṃgho no cen nivārayatv iti /
K10kathinau:20: so pi tadā yadi dānapater āśayo viśuddhaḥ suviśuddhaṃ ca deyavastu syāt tadā tūṣṇībhāvena svīkuryān no cen nivārayet /
K10kathinau:21: yadi tadādhivāsayaty āryasaṃghas tadā supramāṇāṃ surūpāṃ yugalīṃ rañjayitvā 'sya darśayet /
K10kathinau:22: tataḥ kalpikakārakas tām ādāya dānapatiṃ visṛjya hastena māpayitvānayā kaṭhinacīvaraṃ kariṣyati /
K10kathinau:24: dvividhaṃ hi kaṭhinaṃ cīvaraṃ kṛtam akṛtakaṃ ca /
K10kathinau:25: tatra nikāyabhedena trikhaṇḍapañcakhaṇḍādikaṃ pariṇāhenānyūna trihastam āyāmenānyūna pañcahastaṃ susīvitaṃ kṛtakaṃ /
K10kathinau:27: tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ dvividhaṃ niṣṭhitam aniṣṭḥitaṃ ca /
K10kathinau:31: siddhaṃ kaṭhinacīvaram ādāyādhiṣṭhita traimāsasyāryasaṃghasya purastād evaṃ vadet /
K10kathinau:32: samanvāharāryyānena cīvareṇāsmiṃ saṃghāvāse 'mūkanāmā dānapatiḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyati /
K10kathinau:34: evaṃ dvir api trir api tad anv āryasaṃgho pi tad adhyeṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya divā[.. ..
K10kathinau:35: ..]vā masīdravādinā nīlarāgarasena vā prānte catur bindūṃś catusatyādi viśuddhyā
K10kathinau:36: datvā trin vā triratnādi viśuddhyā dvau vā yogasaṃbhārādi viśuddhyā yathā vidhānam
K10kathinau:38: prabhātāyān tu nisāyāṃ parikalpitesūpasṛṣṭe samucchritātapatradhvajapatākā digvidig
K10kathinau:40: pradeśe khaṭvāyām mañcāyām vā pṛthupīṭhake mantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ pañcabhir upahārair abhyarcitaṃ
K10kathinau:42: tad anu tac chrāddho dānapatir udārābhiḥ pūjābhir abhipūjyābhipraṇamya suvarṇarajatatāmrādidhātu
K10kathinau:45: kṣetraṃ vādikā gṛhārāmopavanādikaṃ dāsīdāsahastyaś ca gomahiṣyādikaṃ piṇḍakādipratyāyaṃ ca bahirdhanantāḍapatrādau tan nāmākam vilikhya tatraiva prayacchet /
K10kathinau:47: upakaraṇāni cānekāny upabhogārhāṇi vastūni kaṭhinaṃ saṃspṛśya tat pārśvataḥ saṃghopabhogāya viśrāṇayet /
K10kathinau:49: athāyuṣmān sumanā nāma bhikṣur bhagavantam etad avocat //
K10kathinau:50: bhagavan kena kāraṇena cīvarādikaṃ kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
K10kathinau:52: āyuṣman dṛḍhaṃ viśuddham abhedyaṃ vipulāvināśi ca kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
K10kathinau:53: tathā hi dānapater āśayasya dṛḍhatvāc cīvarasya viśuddhatvāt saṃghasyābhedyatvād dānasya phalasya ca vipulāvināśitvāc ca sarvam eva kaṭhinaṃ bhavati // 8.a
K10kathinau:58: śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme śubhe surabhidhūpadhūpite sugandhipuṣpaprakaropaśobhite
K10kathinau:59: śuciparisare mahārham mahadāsana-m-āsīnaṃ viśuddhabodhiṃ vidhvastasamastadḥsaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ
K10kathinau:60: bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śākyamunīndraṃ mahatpariṣadgaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma /
K10kathinau:61: atha bhagavān tūṣṇībhāvenāvasthitaḥ san sattvārthaṃ prati daśavidhabuddhakṛtyakaraṇāya laukikaṃ cittam etc., v.  22 9.
K10kathinau:62: tataḥ tīrthikaparivrājakacoditāyās tathāgataṃ prati duṣkṛtaṃ karma saṃsmṛtya saṃjātasaṃvegāḥ
K10kathinau:63: sthavirasthāvirā bhikṣavaḥ śirasi vinihitāñjalayo mahadāsanāsīnaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ buddhaṃ
K10kathinau:65: kṛtā bhagavatānekā dharmādhikārikī kathā vyākṛtāś cāneke sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / 11.a
K10kathinau:66: tad anv anavatapte bhagavatḥ purastāt svakasvakāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākurmaḥ / 12.b
K10kathinau:67: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatām daśāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti //
K10kathinau:71: yāvad anekena sattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati /
K10kathinau:72: yāvan na sarve vineyā vinītā bhavanti /
K10kathinau:73: yāvac chrāvakayugam agratāyāṃ na nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
K10kathinau:75: yāvan nāyuṣaḥ pañcamo bhāga utsṛṣṭo bhavati /
K10kathinau:76: yāvan na śrāvastyām mahānagaryāṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
K10kathinau:77: yāvan na śāṃkāśye nagare devāvatāram darśitaṃ bhavati /
K10kathinau:78: yāvan na mātāpitarau satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau bhavataḥ /
K10kathinau:79: yāvad anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikā karmaplotiḥ śrāvakasaṅghena sārdhaṃ na vyākṛtā bhavatīti / 13.a
K10kathinau:80: atha bhagavatā manasi kṛtvā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ vyākṛtā bhavatīti /
K10kathinau:81: bhagavan pūrvikāṃ karmaplotim anavatapte vyākartukāmo bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma / 14.a
K10kathinau:87: visphuradvicitramarīcijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto guratmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihārān
K10kathinau:90: atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgre
K10kathinau:101: gaṅgā ca sindhuś ca nadaś ca vakṣuḥ
K10kathinau:102: śītā ca yān naiva taranti martyāḥ /
K10kathinau:111: atha tatra buddho bhagavāṃl laukikaṃ cittam utpādayati /
K10kathinau:112: tadāntaśaḥ kuntapipīlikādayo bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājānate /
K10kathinau:113: atha nandopanandau nāgarājāv evaṃ saṃlakṣayataḥ kiṃkāraṇaṃ bhagavatedaṃ cittam utpāditam
K10kathinau:114: anavatapte mahāsarasi karmaplotikāṃ vyākartukāma iti buddhādhiṣṭhānena jñātvā tābhyām
K10kathinau:115: anavatapte mahāsarasi madhye śakaṭacakrapramāṇaṃ sahasradalaṃ vilasanmaṇinālakaṃ
K10kathinau:116: suhīrakesaram pañcaratnamayaṃ bhagavata āsanārthaṃ sauvarṇasaroruhaṃ vinirmitaṃ tatra
K10kathinau:117: bhagavān niṣasāda bhikṣavo 'pi bhagavato 'bhisaṃmukham anyāsu kamalakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ 23.a
K10kathinau:118: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputro gṛdhrakūṭe parvate saṃghāṭīṃ sivāyamānas tiṣṭhati /
K10kathinau:119: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma /
K10kathinau:121: evam bhagavann ity āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato vacanam pratiśrutyānavatapte mahāsarasy antarhitaḥ /
K10kathinau:122: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthād āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purastād evaṃ cāha /
K10kathinau:123: he śāriputra śāstā ta ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdham anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmas tvām udīkṣaṇaparas tiṣṭhati
K10kathinau:126: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi /
K10kathinau:127: tato maudgalyāyanena tad vacanam amṛṣyamāṇena rddhyā pañcāṅgulayo 'sya nibaddhāḥ /
K10kathinau:129: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evaṃ saṃghāṭīsūtrā bhavatu /
K10kathinau:131: āyuṣmañ chāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ /
K10kathinau:136: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svarddhyā pañcabhir aṅgulibhiḥ sīvayitum ārabhaḥ /
K10kathinau:138: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evam anyasūtrā bhavatu /
K10kathinau:140: āyuṣmañ śāriputraivaṃ kṛtvā yadi na yāsyasi /
K10kathinau:143: tvaṃ hy āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavata rddhimatāṃ madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
K10kathinau:144: idaṃ tāvat prāg eva māṃ balena nayiṣyasi /
K10kathinau:152: āyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati gṛdhrakūṭaparvatam apy ayam ākarṣayiṣyati /
K10kathinau:157: yadā saṃkṣubdhā bhavanti tadā bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
K10kathinau:162: api ca mahāśrāvakayor anyonyaṃ mahad ṛddhiprakurvitaṃ /
K10kathinau:165: tena yasyāṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ bhagavān niṣaṇṇas tasyāṃ padmanāla upanibaddhaḥ /
K10kathinau:171: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyanaiko 'ham apy āgacchāmi yāvad āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano na gacchati /
K10kathinau:172: tadāyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ prathamataraṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā svāsanapadmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10kathinau:173: tataḥ paścād āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āgataḥ svāsane ca vyavasthitaḥ /
K10kathinau:178: tataḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
K10kathinau:179: paśya bhadanta bhagavatāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano maharddhiko mahānubhāva ṛddhimatām madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
K10kathinau:182: na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvany anena śilpenāpi parājitaḥ / 25
K10kathinau:185: sa kenacit karaṇīyena yavanaviṣayaṃ gato yantrakarācāryasya niveśane 'vatīrṇas tatrāhārādikaṃ kṛtvā vyavasthitaḥ /
K10kathinau:187: sā ca dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā tailodvartanaṃ haste nidhāya sthāpayitā /
K10kathinau:191: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ mama copasthānāya paricārikā preṣitā bhaviṣyatīti /
K10kathinau:195: dhig aho tasya janma jambudvīpe manuṣyasya yasyedṛśī yuvatī rūpayauvanasampannā paramaramaṇīyā
K10kathinau:196: cakṣuṣā vā hastena vā śārīrasparśenādikaṃ [sic] na bhaved ity anenāmṛtasadṛśena mādhuryavacanena
K10kathinau:199: tathāpi sā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā na kiṃcid uktety avadhārya kāmopasaktacetasā satvaram upagamya /
K10kathinau:200: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10kathinau:205: yathāsau sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedopahāsaṃ gamiṣyatīti cintayitvā tena dvārābhimukha ātmodbaddhakaṇṭhakaś citritaḥ /
K10kathinau:218: yasya kasyacin niveśane 'tithiḥ kālaṃ lokāntaraṃ karoti /
K10kathinau:219: tasya tāvat saṃskāro yāvad rājña āveditaṃ bhavati /
K10kathinau:221: deva madhyadeśāc citrakarācārya ihāgataḥ sa ca mama niveśāne 'vatīrṇas tasya mayā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā paricārikā preṣitā /
K10kathinau:222: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
K10kathinau:224: taṃ deva pratyavekṣayatu paścād ahaṃ saṃskāraṃ kariṣyāmi /
K10kathinau:231: tena kuṭhāraṃ gṛhītvā pāśaṃ chettum ārabdhaṃ /
K10kathinau:232: yāvac chinnaḥ sa yantrakarācāryaḥ pratibhinnako vyayasthitaḥ /
K10kathinau:235: tvaṃ punar mayā sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedita iti /
K10kathinau:237: yo 'sau citrakarācārya eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ /
K10kathinau:238: yo 'sau yantrakarācārya eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ /
K10kathinau:248: tato vivādād anyonyaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ sakāśe kathayato 'haṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmi /
K10kathinau:249: aparo 'py ahaṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmīti kathayati /
K10kathinau:251: bhavantau nāhaṃ jāne yo yuṣmākaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte /
K10kathinau:252: api tv eka ekāṃ bhitthiṃ parimārjayatu /
K10kathinau:253: dvitīyo 'py aparām evaṃ tau madhye yamanikāṃ datvā citrayitum ārabdhau /
K10kathinau:256: yena citrakarma kṛtaṃ sa rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K10kathinau:265: rājā tad dṛṣṭvā kathayati svacchataram idaṃ citrakarmeti /
K10kathinau:276: eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣus tadāpy eṣa śilpena parājita iti /
K10kathinau:277: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita iti / 27 A
K10kathinau:282: kadācid atha śaṅkhena padbhyāṃ apṛṣṭo jaṭaḥ krudhā /
K10kathinau:283: likhitaḥ prāha taṃ mūrdhabhedaḥ sūryoyade 'stu te //
K10kathinau:285: ity ukte tena suciraṃ sāndhakāram abhūj jagat //
K10kathinau:289: likhitaḥ śāriputro 'yaṃ tad vijetā tadāpy abhūt //
K10kathinau:290: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita ityādi vistarato jñeyaṃ / 28.b
K10kathinau:291: yāsāṃ dhyānasamāpattīnāṃ lābhī tathāgatas tāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā nāmāpi na jānate /
K10kathinau:292: yāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā lābhinas tāsāṃ śāriputro nāmāpi na jānīte /
K10kathinau:293: yāsāṃ lābhī śāriputras tāsāṃ maudgalyāyano nāmāpi na jānīte /
K10kathinau:294: yāsāṃ lābhī maudgalyāyanas tāsāṃ tadanye śrāvakā nāmāpi na jānate /
K10kathinau:295: ato 'yaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo 'yaṃ śāriputro maudgalyāyanāt kiṃtu bahulavihāriṇāṃ saṃdhāya maya rddhimatām agrata iti nirdiṣṭaḥ / 29
K10kathinau:301: atha sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavas tathāgatājñayā svakasvakaṃ karmaplotikaṃ vyākurvanti /
K10kathinau:303: nāgilo nāma nāmena bhikṣur buddhasya śrāvakaḥ /
K10kathinau:304: praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākārṣīd anavatapte mahāhrade sarasi //
K10kathinau:305: tato nāgilo nāma bhikṣus tathāgatasyāgrato daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvā svakāṃ karmaplotikāṃ vyārocayati sma / 29.3
K10kathinau:309: catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ tu vārāṇi devendratvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // 2
K10kathinau:311: prādeśikānāṃ rājñāṃ tu saṃkhyā mama na vidyate // 3
K10kathinau:312: aho ratnatraye kārāṃ kurvanti yatra mānavāḥ /
K10kathinau:313: parīttamātraṃ dattvā tu labhante vipulaṃ phalam // 4
K10kathinau:314: yadi martyeṣu me janma hitvā divyaṃ sukhaṃ mahat /
K10kathinau:316: yadi devopapattiḥ syāt tyaktvā mānuṣyakaṃ sukham /
K10kathinau:317: devasaṃghasya pūjyo ' smi kaṭhinadānasya tat phalam // 6
K10kathinau:322: dūṣyopari ca tiṣṭhāmi dūṣyaṃ cāpi vitānakam // 8
K10kathinau:323: bhavā udghāṭitā mahyaṃ kleśāś cādhyāsitā mayā /
K10kathinau:326: ṣaḍ abhijñā hy anuprāptāḥ kṛtaṃ buddhasya śāsanam // 10 30 30.1
K10kathinau:331: puṣpaṃ ye sugatasya saṃghasamitau dāsyanti śraddhānvitāḥ
K10kathinau:334: kāyād gandhavaraṃ prayāti sukhino ghrāṇendriyaṃ śudhyati //
K10kathinau:337: ye dhūpaṃ pradadanti manmatharipoḥ saṃghāya sadbhāvatas
K10kathinau:338: te nityaṃ sukham āpnuvanti sukhitā bhogeśvarāḥ śīlinaḥ /
K10kathinau:339: na bhrāntasmṛtayo bhavanti vaśino dhyāneṣu labdhāspadāḥ
K10kathinau:340: śāntiṃ yānti manoharāḥ paṭudhiyaḥ pūjyāḥ sadevāsuraiḥ // dhūpa 30.4
K10kathinau:356: sā pādukāyugaladānam ṛte kutaḥ syāt // upānaha 30.7 30.7.1
K10kathinau:367: prajñā rājñī duritaharaṇe nāsti kācit tayānyā
K10kathinau:368: sā saṃpannā bhavati saphala saṃpadā sarvathaiva // sūtrasūcī 30.9
K10kathinau:370: khaṭikāṃ yo dadātiha jāyate paṇḍito mahān // khaṭikā 30.10 30.10.1
K10kathinau:380: gātrasya bhūṣaṇavidher divi vā kṣitau vā
K10kathinau:385: na bhrājate hi bhuvi vastram ṛte manuṣyaḥ // 2
K10kathinau:386: tasmād vibhūṣaṇam atulyam avekṣyavastraṃ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakaprativāraṇaṃ ca /
K10kathinau:392: śrīcakravartir api vastram ṛte na bhāti // 4
K10kathinau:397: raktaiś cānyaiś ca ramyaiḥ suruciravasanaiś cīvaraiś cārumālām /
K10kathinau:399: hrīvastrālaṅkṛtātmā bhavati paṭumatiḥ sarvadharmeśvaraḥ saḥ // vastra 30.12
K10kathinau:405: na cāpi śastraṃ na tu vajravarṣam /
K10kathinau:409: pūjyo vandyo bhavati manujo yatra yatropapannaḥ
K10kathinau:414: saṃghasya bhojanaṃ dattvā sarvatra sukham edhate // bhojana 30.16
K10kathinau:428: pañca kāmaguṇān bhuktvā tṛṣṇāṃ chindanti śāśvatīm // kumbha 30.20
K10kathinau:432: sarvaṃdadaś ca bhavati gṛhaṃ dattvā gaṇottame /
K10kathinau:433: sarvakāmasamṛddhas tu sarvatra sukham edhate // gṛha 30.22
K10kathinau:441: yaḥ saṃghe pradadāti bhaiṣajavidhīṃs tāṃs tān prasannāśayaḥ
K10kathinau:443: mukto vyādhijarādibhiś ca sukhito jīvaty abhinnāśayaḥ
K10kathinau:446: tatra saṃghe nirābādhe ca bhaiṣajyam ayācata //
K10kathinau:448: ekāṃ harītakīṃ bhuktvā tat karma samudāgamat // 2
K10kathinau:449: pañca janmaśatāny asya na rogaḥ svalpako 'py abhūt /
K10kathinau:450: kleśavyādhiṃ vivarjitya nirvṛttiś carame bhave // 3 // bhaiṣajya 30.25 30.25.1
K10kathinau:452: yo niryātayatīha vītarajase saṃghāya hṛdyaṃ jalam /
K10kathinau:454: tṛṣṇāṃ hanti na kevalaṃ vijahate saṃsāratṛṣṇāṃ api // 30.25.2
K10kathinau:458: na pipāsākṛtaṃ duḥkaṃ svapneṣv api anubhūtavān // 2 // jala 30.26
K10kathinau:459: ye saṃghe pratipādayanti muditās tṛṣṇācchidaṃ pānakaṃ
K10kathinau:462: pāraṃ yānti bhavārṇavasya niyataṃ dattvā śubhaṃ pānakam // pānaka 30.27
K10kathinau:485: śuddhena manasā dravyaṃ svaṃ dadāti yadā pumān /
K10kathinau:487: lakṣmīr jājvalyamānā vasatu iha sadā kīrtir apy utsphurantī
K10kathinau:488: niḥśeṣāriḥ kṣitīśaḥ kṣitim avatu ciraṃ vyādhidurbhikṣamuktām /
K10kathinau:489: śīlāḍhyā dakṣiṇīyāḥ pravacananicaye vṛddhim āyāntu nityam
K10kathinau:495: vibhāti karabhāḥ suro nabhasi yāvad uṣṇaprabhaḥ
K10kathinau:502: yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato 'bhisaṃbuddhasya pāṣāṇāśarkarayā pādāṅguṣṭaḥ kṣataḥ /
K10kathinau:505: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehināṃ /
K10kathinau:506: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeye 'nyatamasmin karvaṭakaviṣaye gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
K10kathinau:508: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
K10kathinau:509: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patny āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā /
K10kathinau:510: kālāntareṇāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt putro jātaḥ /
K10kathinau:512: athāpareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateḥ patnī kālagatā /
K10kathinau:513: tenānyā patny ānītā tasya tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ /
K10kathinau:515: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ putraḥ prasūto duhitā ca jātā /
K10kathinau:517: sa dārakaḥ tasyaiva bhrātuḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhati /
K10kathinau:526: āryaputra nāmāsyaikasya puruṣasya bhūtvopārdham asmākaṃ prabhūtānām upārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10kathinau:531: sa kathayati bhadre kathaṃ nāma svāpateyasyārthe bhrātaraṃ praghātayiṣyāmi /
K10kathinau:533: kāmān khalu sevamānasya nāsti kiñcit pāpakarmākaraṇīyam iti /
K10kathinau:539: tena tatra parvatakuhare prakṣipya pāṣāṇena praghātita iti /
K10kathinau:543: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena /
K10kathinau:544: yat tan mayā vaimātriko bhrātā svāpateyakāraṇāt praghātitaḥ /
K10kathinau:545: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10kathinau:546: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgatasyābhisaṃbuddhasya pāṣāṇaśarkarayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ // 33 B
K10kathinau:547: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato 'bhisaṃbuddhasya khadiraśalākayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ /
K10kathinau:549: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau nipuṇataḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudram avatīrṇau dhanahārakau /
K10kathinau:556: sa tena sārthavāhena tulayā tulayitvā ratnāny apanīya sa sārthavāha ālāpitaḥ /
K10kathinau:558: ayaṃ saṃpannārtho yāsyati ahaṃ vipannārtha iti /
K10kathinau:561: uktaṃ ca sārthavāhena mā vahanaṃ chidraya /
K10kathinau:562: mā sarva evānayena vyasanam āpatsyāma iti /
K10kathinau:567: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat tan mayā śaktiprahāreṇa praghātitaḥ /
K10kathinau:568: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10kathinau:569: tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇa tathāgatasyābhisaṃbuddhasya khadiraśalākayā vajrapādaḥ kṣataḥ // 34 B
K10kathinau:570: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena sundarikāyā mānavikāyā abhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ /
K10kathinau:571: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitānīti vistaraḥ /
K10kathinau:574: aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavān /
K10kathinau:575: vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacanena dvau bhrātarau pravrajitau babhūvatur vasiṣṭho bharadvājas ca /
K10kathinau:577: bharadvājenāpi paṭhatā svādhyāyatā trīṇi piṭakāny adhītāni /
K10kathinau:582: tena tasya bhrātuḥ samvṛttam āgaccaikadhye vāsaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
K10kathinau:583: sa tatra gataḥ tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭaḥ /
K10kathinau:584: arhad bhikṣuḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca dṛṣṭvābhiprasannaḥ /
K10kathinau:585: sa tena prasādajātena pūjayitvā mahārheṇa ca vastreṇācchāditaḥ /
K10kathinau:588: sa vastreṇa chādayaty eṣa chādita iti tasyāntike 'vatāraprekṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
K10kathinau:589: sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ paryavasthitaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati yady aham asya dāsyāmi /
K10kathinau:590: bhūyasyā mātrayā prasādaṃ praveśayiṣyatīti kṛtvā sa tasyaivātisṛṣṭaḥ /
K10kathinau:592: tasya gṛhapateḥ preṣyadārikā tasmin vihāra āgatya parikarma karoti /
K10kathinau:598: tvaṃ ca tad vastrayugaṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kuru /
K10kathinau:599: yadi gṛhapatiḥ pṛcchet kutas tavaitad vastrayugam iti vaktavyam amukenāryeṇa mama dattam iti /
K10kathinau:601: vaktavyam āryeṇaitad api praṣṭavyaṃ kimartham puruṣāḥ strīṇām anuprayacchantīti /
K10kathinau:602: sā taṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya gṛhaparikarma kartum ārabdhā /
K10kathinau:616: yo 'sau bharadvājo nāma yena tad arhann abhūtenābhyākhātaḥ /
K10kathinau:617: aham eva tena kālena tena samayena yat sa mayārhad bhikṣur abhūtenābhyākhyātaḥ /
K10kathinau:618: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni narakeṣūpapannaḥ /
K10kathinau:619: yāvat tenaiva karmāvaśeṣeṇaitarhi tathāgataḥ sundarikāyā mānavikāyā abhūtenābhyākhyāta ityādi vistaraḥ /
